processes: SYS.4 System Integration and Integration Verification

categories.name: Software engineering process group (SWE)

SWE.5 Software Component Verification and Integration Verification

categories.name: Reuse process group (REU)
processes: REU.2 Management of Products for Reuse

ACQ.4 Supplier Monitoring: ACQ.4.BP1: Agree on and maintain joint activities, joint interfaces, and information to be exchanged.

ACQ.4.BP3: Review development work products with the supplier. Review development work products with the supplier on the agreed regular basis, covering technical aspects, problems and risks. Track open measures.
ACQ.4.BP4: Review progress of the supplier.
SYS.1 Requirements Elicitation: SYS.1.BP1: Obtain stakeholder expectations and requests.
SYS.2 System Requirements Analysis: SYS.2.BP4: Analyze the impact on the system context.
SYS.2.BP5: Ensure consistency and establish bidirectional traceability.
SYS.2.BP6: Communicate agreed system requirements and impact on the system context.

commonQuestions: GP 2.1.1: Identify the objectives and define a strategy for the performance of the process.
GP 2.1.2: Plan the performance of the process.
GP 2.1.4: Identify and make available resources.
GP 2.1.5: Monitor and adjust the performance of the process.
GP 2.1.6: Manage the interfaces between involved parties.
GP 2.2.1: Define the requirements for the work products.
GP 2.2.2: Define the requirements for storage and control of the work products.
GP 2.2.3: Identify, store and control the work products.
GP 2.2.4: Review and adjust work products.
